name: Dark Patterns: Unashamed
description:
This game is part of a two-part series of games dedicated educating players on dark patterns. Visit Neve O' Neill's game, Dark Patterns: Forevergram.

Dark Patterns: Unashamed was created by Innes White as part of a 20 day internship for UNESCO City of Design Dundee.

The game and internship were sponsored by InGAME and created as part of Dundee Design Festival 2021 for the online Design House.

Dundee Design Festival is a UNESCO City of Design Dundee project delivered through the Dundee Partnership and hosted by V&A Dundee.

You can see more of my work at innesthetic.com.

Or follow me on Twitter, Instagram or LinkedIn.
